long_description: Essential to every trail runner's kit, the weather-resistant Patagonia Houdini pants for men pack into their own integrated stuff sack and offer breathable performance during wet, fickle weather. Featherweight ripstop nylon fabric is tough, while the Durable Water Repellent finish fends off light precipitation. Houdini pants stuff into their own zippered rear pocket, which has a strong carabiner clip-in loop. Snap closure on lower cuffs make it easy to slip on pants over shoes at a moment's notice. Reflective logo above left knee and rear pocket help keep you visible in low light. Patagonia Houdini pants may be worn over base layers and light mid layers.
